column2: maxim  that justice delayed is justice denied.
The  meaning  of the  maxim  is  that  that if legal  redress  is  available  for a
expeditious manner,  it is  effectively the same  as  having no  redress  at all.

column1: This  principle  is  the  basis  for  the  right  to  a  speedy  trial,  because  it is

column2: unfair  for  a  party  to  have  sustained  an  injury  and  await  the  resolution
